remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的日期的任何一种分配到的模式匹配的字符串表示形式`formats`参数。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 如果字符串`s`与任何定义的变体不匹配。 这些模式的任一`styles`参数，该方法将引发。If the string `s` does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a . 除了比较`s`到多个格式设置模式，而非单个的格式设置模式，此重载的行为完全相同方法。Aside from comparing `s` to multiple formatting patterns, rather than to a single formatting pattern, this overload behaves identically to the method. `s`参数包含要分析的日期和时间。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse. 如果`s`参数只包含时间和当前日期使用没有日期，除非`style`参数包括标志，在这种情况下的默认日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`参数包含仅日期没有时间、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`参数还确定是否`s`参数可以包含前导、 内部，或尾随空格字符比允许的格式字符串中的一个其他`formats`。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`. 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，所返回的属性对象是。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 可以通过更改此行为标志，它将返回值，其属性是，或通过使用并标志，它将返回值，其属性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如果`s`包含时区信息，如有必要，转换为本地时间的时间和所返回的属性对象设置为。If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 可以通过更改此行为标志将协调世界时 (UTC) 转换为本地时间和设置无法属性设置为。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `formats`参数包含数组的模式，其中之一`s`必须完全匹配分析操作成功。The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed. 中的模式`formats`参数从的一个或多个自定义格式说明符组成[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表或单个标准格式说明符，用于从标识预定义的模式，[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表。The patterns in the `formats` parameter consists of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果在自定义格式模式中不使用日期或时间分隔符，使用固定区域性的`provider`参数和最宽的窗体的每个自定义格式说明符。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果你想要在该模式指定小时数，指定较宽的形式"HH"，而不是更窄的窗体"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". `styles`参数包含一个或多个成员枚举，用于确定是否以及其中的空白区域未定义由`format`可以出现在`s`和控制分析操作的确切行为。The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation. 下表描述了每隶属枚举会影响的操作方法。The following table describes how each member of the enumeration affects the operation of the method. |DateTimeStyles 成员DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||分析`s`和，如果有必要，将其转换为 UTC。Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 如果`s`包含时区偏移量，或者如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，但`styles`包括标志，该方法分析字符串，调用将返回为 UTC 值并设置属性设置为。If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`指示它表示 UTC，或如果`s`不包含时区信息，但`styles`包括标志，该方法对字符串进行分析、 对返回不执行任何时区转换值，并设置属性设置为。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在所有其他情况下，该标志没有任何影响。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||指定未定义的该空白`format`可以出现在任何单个的日期或时间元素之间。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear between any individual date or time element.| ||指定未定义的空格`format`可以显示在开头`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the beginning of `s`.| ||指定未定义的空格`format`可以在的终端显示`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the end of `s`.| ||指定的`s`可能包含前导、 内部空格和尾随空格未定义的`format`。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces not defined by `format`.| ||指定如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，假定它是表示本地时间。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非标志存在，则所返回的属性值设置为。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，则假定其值表示 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非标志存在，该方法将返回值与 UTC 与本地时间和集及其属性设置为。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||如果`s`包含时间的返回值的日期设置为不包含日期信息`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.| ||`s`使用默认值分析参数。The `s` parameter is parsed using default values. 中提供的以外的任何空格`format`允许。No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed. 如果`s`缺少所返回的日期的日期部分，值设置为 0001 年 1 月 1 日。If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned value is set to 1/1/0001. 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，所返回的属性对象设置为。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is set to . 如果时区信息中存在`s`，将时间转换为本地时间和所返回的属性对象设置为。If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the property of the returned object is set to .| ||对于包含时区信息的字符串，尝试阻止转换为日期和时间与它属性设置为。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a date and time with its property set to . 此标记主要阻止 UTC 时间的转换为本地时间。This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.| 特定日期和时间的符号和字符串 （例如，在某个特定的语言中星期几的名称） 中使用`s`由定义`provider`参数，因为是精确的格式`s`如果`format`是一种标准格式说明符的字符串。The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `provider`参数可以是任何以下：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示用于解释的区域性`s`。A object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`. 返回的对象及其属性定义的符号和格式设置`s`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自定义实现其方法返回对象或提供格式设置信息的对象。A custom implementation whose method returns either the object or the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`，则使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法，以确保可以成功地分析多种可能的格式字符串。The following example uses the method to ensure that a string in a number of possible formats can be successfully parsed . span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the new object represents local time, UTC, or neither.

summary.span: 创建新的 对象，该对象具有与指定的 相同的刻度数，但是根据指定的 值的指示，指定为本地时间或协调世界时 (UTC)，或者两者皆否。

span.span: Creates a new object that has the same number of ticks as the specified , but is designated as either local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, as indicated by the specified value.

returns.span: 一个新对象，它与由 参数和由 参数指定的 值代表的对象具有相同刻度数。

span.span: A new object that has the same number of ticks as the object represented by the parameter and the value specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象包含指示的时间值基于本地时间、 协调世界时 (UTC)，还是两者皆未，并以 100 毫微秒刻度为单位测量的计时周期字段包含时间值的类型字段。A object consists of a Kind field that indicates whether the time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a Ticks field that contains a time value measured in 100-nanosecond ticks. 方法创建一个新对象使用指定`kind`参数和原始的时间值。The method creates a new object using the specified `kind` parameter and the original time value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 返回值不表示相同即时作为及时`value`参数，和不是一个时区转换方法。The returned value does not represent the same instant in time as the `value` parameter, and is not a time zone conversion method. 相反，则会使指定的时间`value`参数保持不变，并设置属性设置为`kind`。Instead, it leaves the time specified by the `value` parameter unchanged, and sets the property to `kind`. 有关时区转换的信息，请参阅[转换时区时间](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md)。For information about time zone conversions, see [Converting Times Between Time Zones](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md). 方法可在其中接收的互操作性方案中对象未指定的类型字段中，但你可以确定由独立于表示计时周期字段表示本地时间还是基于 UTC。The method is useful in interoperability scenarios where you receive a object with an unspecified Kind field, but you can determine by independent means that the Ticks field represents local time or UTC. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法演示如何属性会影响和转换方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

param.name: value

span.span: The date and time value to subtract.

summary.span: 从此实例中减去指定的日期和时间。

span.span: Subtracts the specified date and time from this instance.

returns.span: 一个时间间隔，它等于此实例所表示的日期和时间减去 所表示的日期和时间。

span.span: A time interval that is equal to the date and time represented by this instance minus the date and time represented by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定两个日期之间的差异。The method determines the difference between two dates. 若要减去的时间间隔从当前实例，调用方法。To subtract a time interval from the current instance, call the method. 要减去的当前实例中的一个特定的时间间隔，调用将这段时间间隔添加到当前日期，该方法并提供的方法参数为负值。To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument. 例如，若要从当前日期的两个月中减去，请调用值为-2 的方法。For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the method with a value of -2. 日期和时间的当前实例是早于`value`，该方法将返回表示负时间跨度的对象。If the date and time of the current instance is earlier than `value`, the method returns a object that represents a negative time span. 所有非零值属性的值 (如或) 为负。That is, the value of all of its non-zero properties (such as or ) is negative. 方法不考虑的值这两个属性值时执行该减法运算。The method does not consider the value of the property of the two values when performing the subtraction. 相减之前对象，请确保这些对象表示在相同的时区的时间。Before subtracting objects, ensure that the objects represent times in the same time zone. 否则，结果将包括在各时区之间的差异。Otherwise, the result will include the difference between time zones. > [!NOTE] > 方法才会认为时区时执行该减法运算之间的差异。The method does consider the difference between time zones when performing the subtraction. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法和减法运算符。The following example demonstrates the method and the subtraction operator. [!code-cpp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/VB/class1.vb#1)]

span.span: An object that is equal to the date and time represented by this instance minus the time interval represented by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回从当前实例指定的时间间隔差值的日期。The method returns the date that is a specified time interval difference from the current instance. 若要确定两个日期之间的时间间隔，请调用方法。To determine the time interval between two dates, call the method. 要减去的当前实例中的一个特定的时间间隔，调用将这段时间间隔添加到当前日期，该方法并提供的方法参数为负值。To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument. 例如，若要从当前日期的两个月中减去，请调用值为-2 的方法。For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the method with a value of -2. 此方法不会更改此设置的值。This method does not change the value of this . 相反，它会返回一个新其值是此操作的结果。Instead, it returns a new whose value is the result of this operation. 通常，方法中减去对象，表示正时间跨度并返回早于的日期和时间的当前实例的值。Ordinarily, the method subtracts a object that represents a positive time span and returns a value that is earlier than the date and time of the current instance. 但是，如果对象表示负时间跨度，方法将返回晚的日期和时间的当前实例的值。However, if the object represents a negative time span, the method returns a value that is later than the date and time of the current instance. 方法允许您以减去相应的包含的时间 （指定的小时数） 和指定的分钟数等的多个单位的时间间隔。The method allows you to subtract a time interval that consists of more than one unit of time (such as a given number of hours and a given number of minutes). 要从中减去的时间 （例如年、 月或天） 的单个单元实例，您可以负的数值作为参数传递到任何以下方法：To subtract a single unit of time (such as years, months, or days) from the instance, you can pass a negative numeric value as a parameter to any of the following methods: - 以减去相应的特定于当前日期和时间实例的年数。, to subtract a specific number of years from the current date and time instance. - 以减去相应的特定于当前日期和时间实例的月份数。, to subtract a specific number of months from the current date and time instance. - 要减去从当前日期和时间实例在特定天数。, to subtract a specific number of days from the current date and time instance. - 以减去相应的特定于当前日期和时间实例的小时数。, to subtract a specific number of hours from the current date and time instance. - 以减去相应的特定于当前日期和时间实例的分钟数。, to subtract a specific number of minutes from the current date and time instance. - 以减去相应的特定的从当前日期和时间实例的秒数。, to subtract a specific number of seconds from the current date and time instance. - 以减去相应的特定于当前日期和时间实例的毫秒数。, to subtract a specific number of milliseconds from the current date and time instance. - 以减去相应的特定自当前日期和时间实例以时钟周期数。, to subtract a specific number of ticks from the current date and time instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法和减法运算符。The following example demonstrates the method and the subtraction operator. [!code-cpp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Subtraction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Subtraction/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示此实例的日期和时间的计时周期数。

span.span: Gets the number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.

value.span: 表示此实例的日期和时间的计时周期数。

span.span: The number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.

value.span: 该值介于 和 之间。

span.span: The value is between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个时钟周期表示 100 个纳秒的一千万分之一。A single tick represents one hundred nanoseconds or one ten-millionth of a second. 没有以毫秒为单位，10000 个计时周期或 1000 万个计时周期一秒内。There are 10,000 ticks in a millisecond, or 10 million ticks in a second. 此属性的值表示 0001 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00:00 以来所经历的 100 纳秒间隔数 (0: 00:00 年 1 月 1 日 UTC 0001，公历日历中的)，表示。The value of this property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 (0:00:00 UTC on January 1, 0001, in the Gregorian calendar), which represents . 它不包括归因于闰秒为单位的计时周期数。It does not include the number of ticks that are attributable to leap seconds. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性，以显示第 21 个世纪以来所经历的计时周期数，并实例化对象。The following example uses the property to display the number of ticks that have elapsed since the beginning of the twenty-first century and to instantiate a object. 对象用来显示使用多个其他时间间隔的时间。The object is then used to display the elapsed time using several other time intervals. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.Ticks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Ticks/cs/Ticks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Ticks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Ticks/vb/Ticks.vb#1)]

value.span: 一个时间间隔，它表示当天自午夜以来已经过时间的部分。

span.span: A time interval that represents the fraction of the day that has elapsed since midnight.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同属性。Unlike the property. 它将返回值，该值表示不带其时间部分，日期属性将返回值，该值表示值的时间部分。which returns a value that represents a date without its time component, the property returns a value that represents a value's time component. 如果你想要显示的时间或检索的一天的时间的字符串表示形式值，可以改为调用的重载方法具有`format`参数或使用[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)功能与"t"或"T"标准格式字符串。If you want to display the time of day or retrieve the string representation of the time of day of a value, you can instead call an overload of the method that has a `format` parameter or use the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature with the "t" or "T" standard format string. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的值属性的数组值。The following example displays the value of the property for an array of values. 它还对照了与返回复合格式设置操作中的"t"标准格式字符串的字符串的返回值。It also contrasts the return value with the string returned by the "t" standard format string in a composite formatting operation. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.TimeOfDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.timeofday/cs/timeofday1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.TimeOfDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.timeofday/vb/timeofday1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将当前 对象序列化为一个 64 位二进制值，该值随后可用于重新创建 对象。

span.span: Serializes the current object to a 64-bit binary value that subsequently can be used to recreate the object.

returns.span: 64 位有符号整数，它对 和 属性进行了编码。

span.span: A 64-bit signed integer that encodes the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将当前值转换为二进制值的对象。Use the method to convert the value of the current object to a binary value. 随后，使用二进制值和方法来重新创建原始对象。Subsequently, use the binary value and the method to recreate the original object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在某些情况下，返回值方法不是与原始值提供给方法。In some cases, the value returned by the method is not identical to the original value supplied to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅下一部分中，"本地时间调整"。For more information, see the next section, "Local Time Adjustment". ## 本地时间调整Local Time Adjustment 表示本地时间，即协调通用时间调整为本地时区结构，其属性具有值。A local time, which is a Coordinated Universal Time adjusted to the local time zone, is represented by a structure whose property has the value . 还原本地时值由生成的二进制表示形式方法，方法可能会调整重新创建的值，以使是否不等于原始值。When restoring a local value from the binary representation that is produced by the method, the method may adjust the recreated value so that it is not equal to the original value. 在下列条件下，可能会出现这种情况：This can occur under the following conditions: - 如果本地由一个时区中序列化对象方法，然后反序列化中通过不同的时区方法中，表示所生成的本地时间自动调整对象为第二个时区。If a local object is serialized in one time zone by the method, and then deserialized in a different time zone by the method, the local time represented by the resulting object is automatically adjusted to the second time zone. 例如，考虑对象，表示本地时间的下午 3 点For example, consider a object that represents a local time of 3 P.M. 在美国执行应用程序使用太平洋时区方法以将其转换为二进制值的对象。An application that is executing in the U.S. Pacific Time zone uses the method to convert that object to a binary value. 在美国执行的另一个应用程序使用东部标准时间时区方法将转换为一个新的二进制值对象。Another application that is executing in the U.S. Eastern Time zone uses the method to convert the binary value to a new object. 新值对象是下午 6 时，这表示时间作为原始的下午 3 点到相同的点The value of the new object is 6 P.M., which represents the same point in time as the original 3 P.M. 值，但将会调整为美国东部时区中的本地时间。value, but is adjusted to local time in the Eastern Time zone. - 如果本地的二进制表示形式值表示本地时区的系统中的无效时间是调用，该时间会调整，这样就有效。If the binary representation of a local value represents an invalid time in the local time zone of the system on which is called, the time is adjusted so that it is valid. 例如，从标准时间到夏时制的转换发生在美国在 2010 年 3 月 14 日凌晨 2:00，此时时间前进一小时，上午 3 点到太平洋时区For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M. 此小时间隔为无效的时间，即，不存在该时区的时间间隔。This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone. 下面的示例演示时的时间内此范围转换为二进制值通过方法，然后通过还原方法中，原始值调整为有效的时间。The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to a binary value by the method and is then restored by the method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time. 您可以确定是否特定日期和时间值也可能受到修改将其传递到方法，该示例作为演示。You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the method, as the example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.FromBinary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.frombinary/cs/frombinary1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.FromBinary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.frombinary/vb/frombinary1.vb#1)] ## 版本的注意事项Version Considerations 从.NET Framework 2.0 版中，开始结构组成的私有类型字段，指示指定的时间值基于本地时间、 协调世界时 (UTC)，还是两者皆未和一个专用的计时周期字段，其中包含指定的日期和时间的 100 纳秒为刻度数。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, a structure consists of a private Kind field, which indicates whether the specified time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a private Ticks field, which contains the number of 100-nanosecond ticks that specify a date and time. 计时周期数字段可以访问与属性和类型字段都可以访问与属性。The Ticks field can be accessed with the property and the Kind field can be accessed with the property. 在.NET Framework 2.0 中，如果您序列化之前对象而使用序列化接口，如不是手动，只需序列化中的计时周期数据结构。Prior to the .NET Framework 2.0, if you serialized a object manually instead of using a serialization interface such as , you only needed to serialize the Ticks data in the structure. 从 2.0 版开始，必须还序列化类型的数据。Starting with version 2.0, you must also serialize the Kind data.

summary.span: 获取当前日期。

span.span: Gets the current date.

value.span: 一个对象，设置为当天日期，其时间组成部分设置为 00:00:00。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，返回值是其属性返回。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the return value is a whose property returns . 它将返回当前日期不包括当前时间，因为属性是适用于仅使用日期的应用程序中使用。Because it returns the current date without the current time, the property is suitable for use in applications that work with dates only. 有关详细信息，请参阅[选择之间 DateTime、 DateTimeOffset、 TimeSpan 和 TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md)。For details, see [Choosing Between DateTime, DateTimeOffset, TimeSpan, and TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md). 与此相反，属性返回当前日期未的当前时间和属性返回当前日期和当前时间。In contrast, the property returns the current time without the current date, and the property returns both the current date and the current time. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来检索当前日期。The following example uses the property to retrieve the current date. 它还阐释了如何可使用一些标准日期和时间格式字符串的格式设置值。It also illustrates how a value can be formatted using some of the standard date and time format strings. 请注意通过第三个调用生成的输出方法使用 g 格式说明符来包含时间部分，为零。Note that the output produced by the third call to the method uses the g format specifier to include the time component, which is zero. summary.span: 将当前 对象的值转换为 Windows 文件时间。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to a Windows file time.

returns.span: 表示为 Windows 文件时间的当前 对象的值。

span.span: The value of the current object expressed as a Windows file time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 文件时间是 64 位值，它表示午夜 12:00，公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日起经过的 100 纳秒间隔数A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 使用的文件时间记录时应用程序创建、 访问，或写入文件。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. 方法使用属性来确定是否当前对象是本地时间、 UTC 时间或未指定的类型的时间被视为本地时间。The method uses the property to determine whether the current object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a local time. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/VB/class1.vb#1)]

span.span: The resulting file time would represent a date and time before 12:00 midnight January 1, 1601 C.E.
UTC.

para.span: 通常，方法还原保存的值方法。

para.span: 但是，可能在以下情况下不同的两个值：

span.span: However, the two values may differ under the following conditions:

para.span: -如果序列化和反序列化值出现在不同时区中。

span.span: - If the serialization and deserialization of the value occur in different time zones.

para.span: 例如，如果值时间为中午 12:30

span.span: For example, if a value with a time of 12:30 P.M.

para.span: 在美国东部标准时间时区被序列化，并在美国然后反序列化太平洋时区，中午 12:30 的原始值

span.span: in the U.S. Eastern Time zone is serialized, and then deserialized in the U.S. Pacific Time zone, the original value of 12:30 P.M.

para.span: 调整为上午 9:30

span.span: is adjusted to 9:30 A.M.

para.span: 以反映两个时区之间的差异。

span.span: to reflect the difference between the two time zones.

span.span: - If the value that is serialized represents an invalid time in the local time zone.

para.span: 在这种情况下，方法调整还原值，使其在本地时区表示有效的时间。

para.span: 例如，从标准时间到夏时制的转换发生在美国在 2010 年 3 月 14 日凌晨 2:00，此时时间前进一小时，上午 3 点到太平洋时区

span.span: For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M.

para.span: 此小时间隔为无效的时间，即，不存在该时区的时间间隔。

para.span: 您可以确定是否特定日期和时间值也可能受到修改将其传递到方法，该示例作为演示。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 文件时间是 64 位值，它表示午夜 12:00，公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日起经过的 100 纳秒间隔数A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 使用的文件时间记录时应用程序创建、 访问，或写入文件。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. 方法使用属性来确定是否当前对象是本地时间、 UTC 时间或未指定的类型的时间被视为 UTC 时间。The method uses the property to determine whether the current object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a UTC time. 如果是本地时间，它将时间转换为 UTC 之前执行到 Windows 文件时间转换。If it is a local time, it converts the time to UTC before performing the conversion to a Windows file time.

exception.span: 所生成的文件时间将表示公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 之前的日期和时间。

UTC.

summary.span: 将当前 对象的值转换为本地时间。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to local time.

returns.span: 一个对象，其 属性为 ，并且其值为等效于当前 对象的值的本地时间；如果经转换的值过大以至于不能由 对象表示，则为 ，或者，如果经转换的值过小以至于不能表示为 对象，则为 。

span.span: An object whose property is , and whose value is the local time equivalent to the value of the current object, or if the converted value is too large to be represented by a object, or if the converted value is too small to be represented as a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地时间等于的协调世界时 (UTC) 时间加上 UTC 偏移量。The local time is equal to the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time plus the UTC offset. 有关的 UTC 偏移量的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the UTC offset, see . 转换还会考虑适用于由当前时间的夏时制规则对象。The conversion also takes into account the daylight saving time rule that applies to the time represented by the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，方法从 UTC 转换为本地时间时识别只是将当前的调整规则。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when converting from UTC to local time. 因此，当前的调整规则生效之前的转换可能不准确反映 UTC 与当地时间之间的差异。As a result, conversions for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect may not accurately reflect the difference between UTC and local time. 从.NET Framework 版本 2.0 中，返回的值开始方法通过确定属性与当前对象。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the value returned by the method is determined by the property of the current object. 下表描述了可能的结果。The following table describes the possible results. |类型Kind|结果Results| |----------|-------------| ||此实例转换为本地时间。This instance of is converted to local time.| ||不执行任何转换。No conversion is performed.| ||此实例的被假定为 UTC 时间，并执行转换像了。This instance of is assumed to be a UTC time, and the conversion is performed as if were .| > [!NOTE] > 方法将为本地时间与 utc 之间的值。The method converts a value from UTC to local time. 若要将任何指定时区的时间转换为本地时间，使用方法。To convert the time in any designated time zone to local time, use the method. 由转换返回的值是其属性始终返回。The value returned by the conversion is a whose property always returns . 返回有效结果，因此，即使重复应用于相同。Consequently, a valid result is returned even if is applied repeatedly to the same . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 请注意，确切的输出取决于当前区域性和其运行的系统的本地时区。Note that the exact output depends on the current culture and the local time zone of the system on which it is run. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下面的示例使用方法演示如何属性会影响和转换方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前值对象的格式使用定义的模式与当前线程区域性关联的属性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 返回值是通过指定"D"返回的值相同[标准 DateTime 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)与方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "D" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 返回的字符串方法是区分区域性的。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它反映当前区域性定义的模式对象。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，对于 EN-US 区域性，标准的长日期模式为"dddd，MMMMdd，yyyy";对于 DE-DE 区域性中，它是"dddd，d。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard long date pattern is "dddd, MMMMdd, yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dddd, d. MMMMyyyy";对于 JA-JP 区域性，它是"yyyy？M？d'？ '"。MMMMyyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy'?'M'?'d'?'". 以便它不同于标准的长日期格式字符串，也可以定制特定计算机上的特定格式字符串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard long date format string. 有关当前线程区域性的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 有关格式字符、 格式模式和输出它们生成的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主题。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 有关更改与格式字符关联的格式模式的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. summary.span: 将此实例的值转换为等效的 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to the equivalent OLE Automation date.

returns.span: 一个双精度浮点数，它包含与此实例的值等效的 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: A double-precision floating-point number that contains an OLE Automation date equivalent to the value of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个浮点数，其不可或缺的组件是之前或之后 30 1899 年 12 月，日午夜天数，其小数部分表示除以 24 该天的时间作为实现的 OLE 自动化日期。An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose integral component is the number of days before or after midnight, 30 December 1899, and whose fractional component represents the time on that day divided by 24. 例如，午夜 1899 年 12 月 31 日由表示 1.0;上午 6 时，由 2.25; 表示 1900 年 1 月 1午夜 1899 年 12 月 29 为由-1.0;和上午 6 到 1899 年 12 月 29-1.25 由表示。For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25. 基础 OLE 自动化日期是 1899 年 12 月 30 日午夜。The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899. 最小的 OLE 自动化日期是 1 年 1 月 0100年午夜。The minimum OLE Automation date is midnight, 1 January 0100. 最大的 OLE 自动化日期等同于、 31 年 12 月的那一刻 9999。The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as , the last moment of 31 December 9999. 方法会抛出如果当前实例表示的日期晚于和早于 0100 January1，午夜。The method throws an if the current instance represents a date that is later than and earlier than midnight on January1, 0100. 但是，如果当前实例的值为，该方法返回 0。However, if the value of the current instance is , the method returns 0. 有关 OLE 自动化的详细信息，请参阅[MSDN 库](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 此实例的值无法表示为 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前值对象的格式使用定义的模式与当前线程区域性关联的属性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 返回值是通过指定"d"返回的值相同[标准 DateTime 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)与方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "d" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 返回的字符串方法是区分区域性的。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它反映当前区域性定义的模式对象。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，对于 EN-US 区域性，标准的短日期模式是"年-月-日";对于 DE-DE 区域性中，它是"dd。MM.yyyy";对于 JA-JP 区域性，它是"yyyy/M/d"。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard short date pattern is "M/d/yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dd.MM.yyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy/M/d". 以便它不同于标准的短日期格式字符串，也可以定制特定计算机上的特定格式字符串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard short date format string. 有关当前线程区域性的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 有关格式字符、 格式模式和输出它们生成的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主题。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 有关更改与格式字符关联的格式模式的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 它还表明，调用的结果方法等同于调用使用"d"作为 format 参数的方法。It also shows that the result of calling the method is identical to calling the method with "d" as the format parameter. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToShortDateString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToShortDateString/cs/ToShortDateString.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToShortDateString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToShortDateString/vb/ToShortDateString.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用当前的区域性格式约定将当前 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the formatting conventions of the current culture.

returns.span: 当前 对象的值的字符串表示形式。

span.span: A string representation of the value of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前值对象的格式使用常规日期和时间格式说明符 (G)。The value of the current object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'). 若要设置使用特定的日期和时间格式说明符的格式，请调用方法。To format it using a specific date and time format specifier, call the method. 若要设置其特定区域性使用的常规日期和时间格式说明符 (G) 格式，请调用方法。To format it using the general date and time format specifier ('G') for a specific culture, call the method. 若要使用特定的日期和时间格式说明符和特定区域性的约定对其设置的格式，请调用方法。To format it using a specific date and time format specifier and the conventions of a specific culture, call the method. 此方法使用派生自当前区域性的格式设置信息。This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. 具体而言，它结合了返回的自定义格式字符串并的属性返回的对象`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat`属性。In particular, it combines the custom format strings returned by the and properties of the object returned by the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat` property. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 另一个重载方法使您能够指定的区域性的格式设置的使用并定义输出模式的值。Other overloads of the method enable you to specify the culture whose formatting to use and to define the output pattern of the value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何的字符串表示形式返回值方法取决于当前区域性。The following example illustrates how the string representation of a value returned by the method depends on the thread current culture. 它为 FR-FR 为 JA-JP 从 EN-US 更改当前线程区域性。It changes the current thread culture from en-US to fr-FR to ja-JP. 在每种情况下调用方法以返回使用该区域性的日期和时间值的字符串表示形式。and in each case calls the method to return the string representation of a date and time value using that culture. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前值对象的格式使用常规日期和时间格式说明符 (G) 格式使用短日期模式和长时间模式的输出。The value of the current object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'), which formats output using the short date pattern and the long time pattern. 短日期和长时间模式的格式由定义`provider`参数。The format of the short date and long time pattern is defined by the `provider` parameter. `provider`参数可以是任何以下：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示在返回的字符串中反映其格式设置约定的区域性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 返回对象属性定义返回的字符串的格式设置。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 实现一个自定义对象接口。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法将返回提供格式设置信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`，则使用与当前区域性关联的对象。If `provider` is `null`, the object associated with the current culture is used. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的示例显示的日期和时间使用的字符串表示形式代表五个不同区域的对象。The following example displays the string representation of a date and time using objects that represent five different cultures. summary.span: 使用指定的格式和当前区域性的格式约定将当前 对象的值转换为它的等效字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and the formatting conventions of the current culture.

returns.span: 由 指定的当前 对象的值的字符串表示形式。

span.span: A string representation of value of the current object as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回使用当前区域性的; 有关详细信息的格式设置约定的特定格式的日期和时间值的字符串表示形式，请参阅。The method returns the string representation of a date and time value in a specific format that uses the formatting conventions of the current culture; for more information, see . `format`参数应包含单个格式说明符 (请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自定义格式模式 (请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))，它定义返回的字符串的格式。The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) that defines the format of the returned string. 如果`format`是`null`或使用空字符串，常规格式说明符，G。If `format` is `null` or an empty string, the general format specifier, 'G', is used. 此方法的一些用途包括：Some uses of this method include: - 获取一个字符串在当前区域性的短日期和时间格式显示日期和时间。Getting a string that displays the date and time in the current culture’s short date and time format. 若要执行此操作，您可以使用"G"格式说明符。To do this, you use the "G" format specifier. - 获取一个字符串，包含月份和年份。Getting a string that contains only the month and year. 若要执行此操作，您可以使用"MM/yyyy"格式字符串。To do this, you use the "MM/yyyy" format string. 格式字符串使用当前区域性的日期分隔符。The format string uses the current culture’s date separator. - 获取一个字符串，包含的日期和时间以特定格式。Getting a string that contains the date and time in a specific format. 例如，"MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm"格式字符串中以固定格式显示日期和时间字符串如"19 / 03 / / 2013年 18:06"。For example, the "MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm" format string displays the date and time string in a fixed format such as "19//03//2013 18:06". 格式字符串使用"/"作为固定的日期分隔符，而不考虑特定于区域性的设置。The format string uses "/" as a fixed date separator regardless of culture-specific settings. - 可用于序列化的日期字符串获取压缩格式的日期。Getting a date in a condensed format that could be used for serializing a date string. 例如，"yyyyMMdd"格式字符串将显示与任何日期分隔符后跟两位数月份和两位数日期的四位数年份。For example, the "yyyyMMdd" format string displays a four-digit year followed by a two-digit month and a two-digit day with no date separator. 以下示例使用这三个格式字符串来显示日期和时间值使用 EN-US 和 FR-FR 区域性的约定。The following example uses these three format strings to display a date and time value by using the conventions of the en-US and fr-FR cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/tostring5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/tostring5.vb#5)] ## Examples 以下示例使用的每个标准日期和时间格式字符串和自定义日期和时间格式字符串的选择集要显示的字符串表示形式值。The following example uses each of the standard date and time format strings and a selection of custom date and time format strings to display the string representation of a value. 该示例的线程当前区域性为 EN-US。The thread current culture for the example is en-US. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`参数可以包含单个格式说明符 (请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自定义格式模式 (请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))。The `format` parameter can contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)). 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，使用标准格式说明符，"G"。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the standard format specifier, "G", is used. `provider`参数定义与标准格式说明符，以及符号和日期和时间组件的名称相对应的模式。The `provider` parameter defines the pattern that corresponds to the standard format specifiers, as well as the symbols and names of date and time components. `provider`参数可以是任何以下：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示在返回的字符串中反映其格式设置约定的区域性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 返回对象属性定义返回的字符串的格式设置。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 实现一个自定义对象接口。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法将返回提供格式设置信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`，则关联与当前使用区域性。If `provider` is `null`, the associated with the current culture is used. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 以下示例使用每个标准日期时间格式字符串来显示日期和时间为四个不同的区域性的字符串表示形式。The following example uses each of the standard date time format strings to display the string representation of a date and time for four different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/tostring3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/tostring3.vb#4)] 下面的示例演示的格式设置的不同方式值使用固定条件。The following example demonstrates different ways of formatting a value using the invariant . [!code-cpp[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public DateTime ToUniversalTime ();
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.DateTime ToUniversalTime() cil managed
Public Function ToUniversalTime () As DateTime
public: DateTime ToUniversalTime();
member this.ToUniversalTime : unit -> DateTime

summary.span: 将当前 对象的值转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

returns.span: 一个对象，其 属性为 ，并且其值为等效于当前 对象的值的 UTC；如果经转换的值过大以至于不能由 对象表示，则为 ，或者，如果经转换的值过小以至于不能表示为 对象，则为 。

span.span: An object whose property is , and whose value is the UTC equivalent to the value of the current object, or if the converted value is too large to be represented by a object, or if the converted value is too small to be represented by a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协调世界时 (UTC) 等于的本地时间减的 UTC 偏移量。The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) is equal to the local time minus the UTC offset. 有关的 UTC 偏移量的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the UTC offset, see . 转换还会考虑适用于由当前时间的夏时制规则对象。The conversion also takes into account the daylight saving time rule that applies to the time represented by the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，方法从本地时间转换为 UTC 时识别只是将当前的调整规则。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when converting from local time to UTC. 因此，当前的调整规则生效之前的转换可能不准确地反映本地时间与 UTC 之间的差异。As a result, conversions for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect may not accurately reflect the difference between local time and UTC. 从.NET Framework 版本 2.0 中，返回的值开始方法通过确定属性与当前对象。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the value returned by the method is determined by the property of the current object. 下表描述了可能的结果。The following table describes the possible results. |类型Kind|结果Results| |----------|-------------| ||不执行任何转换。No conversion is performed.| ||当前对象转换为 UTC。The current object is converted to UTC.| ||当前对象被假定为本地时间，并执行转换像了。The current object is assumed to be a local time, and the conversion is performed as if were .| > [!NOTE] > 方法将值从从当地时间为 UTC。The method converts a value from local time to UTC. 若要将时间转换为 UTC 非本地时间区域中，使用方法。To convert the time in a non-local time zone to UTC, use the method. 若要转换其相对于 UTC 的偏移量已知的时间，使用方法。To convert a time whose offset from UTC is known, use the method. 如果日期和时间实例值是不明确的时间，此方法假设它是标准时间。If the date and time instance value is an ambiguous time, this method assumes that it is a standard time. （不明确时间是指可以映射到标准时间或在本地时区的夏令时）如果日期和时间实例值是无效时间，此方法只需减去本地时区的 UTC 偏移量以返回 UTC 中的本地时间。(An ambiguous time is one that can map either to a standard time or to a daylight saving time in the local time zone) If the date and time instance value is an invalid time, this method simply subtracts the local time from the local time zone's UTC offset to return UTC. （无效的时间是指因夏令时调整规则的应用程序而不存在。）(An invalid time is one that does not exist because of the application of daylight saving time adjustment rules.) ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下面的示例使用方法演示如何属性会影响和转换方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

para.span: 方法有时用来将本地时间转换为 UTC。

span.span: The method is sometimes used to convert a local time to UTC.

para.span: 然后调用方法来还原原始的本地时间。

span.span: The method is then called to restore the original local time.

para.span: 但是，如果原始时间表示本地时区的时间无效，则两个本地时间值不会相等。

span.span: However, if the original time represents an invalid time in the local time zone, the two local time values will not be equal.

para.span: 有关其他信息和示例，请参阅方法。

span.span: For additional information and an example, see the method.

para.span: 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，方法只识别当前调整规则的本地时区，并将其应用于所有日期，包括低级别日期 （即早于当前的调整的开始日期规则）。

span.span: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule for the local time zone, which it applies to all dates, including down-level dates (that is, dates that are earlier than the starting date of the current adjustment rule).

para.span: 在上运行的应用程序[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]需要从历史上看准确的本地日期和时间计算通过使用必须解决此行为方法来检索对象，它对应于本地时区，并调用其方法。

span.span: Applications running on [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] that require historically accurate local date and time calculations must work around this behavior by using the method to retrieve a object that corresponds to the local time zone and calling its method.

para.span: 下面的示例说明了之间的差异并上的方法[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]位于美国。

span.span: The following example illustrates the difference between the and methods on a [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] system in the U.S. Pacific Time zone.

para.span: 第一个的两个方法调用适用于 2006 年的日期的当前时区调整规则 （这在 2007 年开始生效）。

span.span: The first two method calls apply the current time zone adjustment rule (which went into effect in 2007) to a date in 2006.

para.span: 当前的调整规则提供了在 3 月; 的第二个星期日为夏时制转换上一个规则，这实际上是在 2006 年，提供为夏时制年 4 月的第一个星期日发生转换。

span.span: The current adjustment rule provides for the transition to daylight saving time on the second Sunday of March; the previous rule, which was in effect in 2006, provided for the transition to daylight saving time to occur on the first Sunday of April.

para.span: 仅在第三个方法调用准确地执行此历史日期和时间的转换。

span.span: Only the third method call accurately performs this historical date and time conversion.

span.span: [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.touniversaltime/cs/touniversaltime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.touniversaltime/vb/touniversaltime.vb#1)]

span.span: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its equivalent and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.

span.span: if the parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是类似于方法，不同之处在于方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。The method is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 将字符串`s`在当前使用的格式设置信息分析对象，它由当前线程区域性隐式提供。The string `s` is parsed using formatting information in the current object, which is supplied implicitly by the current thread culture. 如果可能，此方法尝试忽略无法识别的数据，并填充缺少的月、 日和年信息与当前日期。This method tries to ignore unrecognized data, if possible, and fills in missing month, day, and year information with the current date. 如果`s`包含仅日期而没有时间，此方法假设时间为午夜 12:00。If `s` contains only a date and no time, this method assumes the time is 12:00 midnight. 如果`s`包括一个日期组件的两位数年份，它将转换为值的基础的当前区域性的当前日历中每年属性。If `s` includes a date component with a two-digit year, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 任何前导、 内部或尾随空格字符中的`s`将被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white space character in `s` is ignored. 日期和时间可以使用的前导空格和尾随数字符号字符 （' #'，U + 0023），对括起来并可以尾随一个或多个 NULL 字符 (U + 0000)。The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ('#', U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000). 因为方法会尝试分析日期的字符串表示形式，并使用当前区域性，尝试分析跨不同的区域性特定字符串的格式设置规则的时间可以失败或返回不同的结果。Because the method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time using the formatting rules of the current culture, trying to parse a particular string across different cultures can either fail or return different results. 如果将跨不同的区域设置分析特定的日期和时间格式，请使用方法或的重载之一方法并提供格式说明符。If a specific date and time format will be parsed across different locales, use the method or one of the overloads of the method and provide a format specifier. 如果`s`闰日，在闰年中当前日历，方法分析的字符串表示形式`s`成功。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a leap year in the current calendar, the method parses `s` successfully. 如果`s`闰日中非-闰年当前区域性的当前日历中的字符串表示形式，分析操作将失败，该方法将返回`false`。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a non-leap year in the current culture's current calendar, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，`result`包含值，其属性是方法返回时。If `s` contains no time zone information, `result` contains a value whose property is when the method returns. 如果要分析的字符串包含时区信息`result`包含值，其属性是方法返回时。If the string to be parsed contains time zone information, `result` contains a value whose property is when the method returns. ## Examples 下面的示例将传递到的日期和时间字符串的数目方法。The following example passes a number of date and time strings to the method. [!code-cpp[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cpp/datetime.tryparse1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)]

span.span: The method can unexpectedly fail and return if the current and properties are set to the same value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析字符串可包含日期、 时间和时区信息。The method parses a string that can contain date, time, and time zone information. 它是类似于方法，不同之处在于方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。It is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 此方法将尝试忽略无法识别的数据和分析`s`完全。This method attempts to ignore unrecognized data and parse `s` completely. 如果`s`包含时间但没有日期，通过默认的替换当前日期的方法; 如果`styles`包括标志，它将替代`DateTime.Date.MinValue`。If `s` contains a time but no date, the method by default substitutes the current date or, if `styles` includes the flag, it substitutes `DateTime.Date.MinValue`. 如果`s`包含日期，但没有时间，12:00 午夜用作默认的时间。If `s` contains a date but no time, 12:00 midnight is used as the default time. 如果存在日期但其年份部分只有两位数字组成，它将转换为一年`provider`上的值基于参数的当前日历属性。If a date is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the property. 任何前导、 内部或尾随空格字符中的`s`将被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white space characters in `s` are ignored. 日期和时间可以使用的前导空格和尾随数字符号字符 （' #'，U + 0023），对括起来并可以尾随一个或多个 NULL 字符 (U + 0000)。The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ('#', U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000). 由定义的日期和时间元素，以及名称和符号中日期和时间，使用特定有效格式`provider`可以为以下任何参数：Specific valid formats for date and time elements, as well as the names and symbols used in dates and times, are defined by the `provider` parameter, which can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示的格式设置中使用的区域性`s`参数。A object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `s` parameter. 返回的对象属性定义中使用的格式`s`。The object returned by the property defines the formatting used in `s`. - 一个对象，用于定义中使用的格式`s`。A object that defines the formatting used in `s`. - 一个自定义 实现。A custom implementation. 其方法将返回对象，用于定义中使用的格式`s`。Its method returns a object that defines the formatting used in `s`. 如果 `provider` 为 `null`，则使用当前区域性。If `provider` is `null`, the current culture is used. 如果`s`闰日，在闰年中当前日历，方法分析的字符串表示形式`s`成功。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a leap year in the current calendar, the method parses `s` successfully. 如果`s`闰日中非-闰年的当前日历中的字符串表示形式`provider`，分析操作失败，并且该方法将返回`false`。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a non-leap year in the current calendar of `provider`, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. `styles`参数定义的已分析的字符串和分析操作应如何处理它的确切解释。The `styles` parameter defines the precise interpretation of the parsed string and how the parse operation should handle it. 它可以是一个或多个成员的枚举，如下表中所述。It can be one or more members of the enumeration, as described in the following table. |DateTimeStyles 成员DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||分析`s`和，如果有必要，将其转换为 UTC。Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 如果`s`包含时区偏移量，或者如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，但`styles`包括标志，该方法分析字符串，调用将返回为 UTC 值并设置属性设置为。If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`指示它表示 UTC，或如果`s`不包含时区信息，但`styles`包括标志，该方法对字符串进行分析、 对返回不执行任何时区转换值，并设置属性设置为。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在所有其他情况下，该标志没有任何影响。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||虽然有效，但将忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 中的日期和时间元素允许内部的空白区域`s`。Inner white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||虽然有效，但将忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 中的日期和时间元素允许前导空白字符`s`。Leading white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||虽然有效，但将忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 中的日期和时间元素允许存在尾随空格`s`。Trailing white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||指定`s`可能包含前导、 内部空格和尾随空格。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior. 不能重写通过提供更具限制性枚举值，如。It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive enumeration value such as .| ||指定如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，假定它是表示本地时间。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非标志存在，则所返回的属性值设置为。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，则假定其值表示 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非标志存在，该方法将返回值与 UTC 与本地时间和集及其属性设置为。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||虽然有效，但将忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored.| ||对于包含时区信息的字符串，尝试阻止的日期和时间字符串转换值替换其属性设置为。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion of a date and time string to a value with its property set to . 通常情况下，通过调用创建此类字符串方法使用"o"、"r"或"u"标准格式说明符。Typically, such a string is created by calling the method using either the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifiers.| 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，方法将返回值，其属性是除非`styles`标志指示，否则。If `s` contains no time zone information, the method returns a value whose property is unless a `styles` flag indicates otherwise. 如果`s`时区偏移量的信息，包括方法执行任何必要的时间转换并返回以下值之一：If `s` includes time zone or time zone offset information, the method performs any necessary time conversion and returns one of the following: - 一个其日期和时间反映了本地时间和它的值属性是。A value whose date and time reflect the local time and whose property is . - 或者，如果`styles`包括标志，值的日期和时间反映 UTC 并且其属性是。Or, if `styles` includes the flag, a value whose date and time reflect UTC and whose property is . 重写此行为，只需使用标志。This behavior can be overridden by using the flag. ## 分析自定义区域性Parsing Custom Cultures 如果您要分析生成的自定义区域性的日期和时间字符串，使用方法而不是方法以提高分析操作成功的可能性。If you parse a date and time string generated for a custom culture, use the method instead of the method to improve the probability that the parse operation will succeed. 自定义区域性日期和时间字符串可以是复杂且难以分析。A custom culture date and time string can be complicated and difficult to parse. 方法会尝试将字符串与多个隐式分析模式，所有这些可能会失败。The method attempts to parse a string with several implicit parse patterns, all of which might fail. 与此相反，方法要求您显式指定一个或多个可能会成功的确切的分析模式。In contrast, the method requires you to explicitly designate one or more exact parse patterns that are likely to succeed. 有关自定义区域性的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about custom cultures, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example illustrates the method. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.TryParse#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cs/tryparse2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.TryParse#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/vb/tryparse2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的日期，必须在所定义的格式的字符串表示形式`format`参数。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter. 它是类似于方法，不同之处在于方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。It is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`参数包含要分析的日期和时间，而且必须在定义的格式`format`参数。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse and must be in a format defined by the `format` parameter. 如果日期、 时间和时区元素中存在`s`，他们必须也显示在指定的顺序`format`。If date, time, and time zone elements are present in `s`, they must also appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`format`用于定义一个日期包含任何时间元素，并且分析操作成功，则生成值具有时间为午夜 (00: 00:00)。If `format` defines a date with no time element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value has a time of midnight (00:00:00). 如果`format`定义的时间与任何日期元素，并且分析操作成功，则生成默认情况下的值具有的日期`DateTime.Now.Date`，或者它具有的日期`DateTime.MinValue.Date`如果`styles`包括标志。If `format` defines a time with no date element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value by default has a date of `DateTime.Now.Date`, or it has a date of `DateTime.MinValue.Date` if `styles` includes the flag. `style`参数确定是否`s`参数可以包含前导、 内部或尾随空格字符。The `style` parameter determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters. 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，所返回的属性对象是。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 可以通过更改此行为标志，它将返回值，其属性是，或通过使用并标志，它将返回值，其属性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如果 s 包含时区信息，如有必要，为本地时间转换的时间和所返回的属性对象设置为。If s contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 可以通过更改此行为标志将协调世界时 (UTC) 转换为本地时间和设置无法属性设置为。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `format`参数包含对应于预期的格式模式`s`参数。The `format` parameter contains a pattern that corresponds to the expected format of the `s` parameter. 中的模式`format`参数从的一个或多个自定义格式说明符组成[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表或单个标准格式说明符，用于从标识预定义的模式，[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表。The pattern in the `format` parameter consists of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果在自定义格式模式中不使用日期或时间分隔符，使用固定区域性的`provider`参数和最宽的窗体的每个自定义格式说明符。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果你想要在该模式指定小时数，指定较宽的形式"HH"，而不是更窄的窗体"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". > [!NOTE] > 而不是要求`s`符合一种格式以便分析操作成功，您可以调用方法并指定多个允许的格式。Rather than requiring that `s` conform to a single format for the parse operation to succeed, you can call the method and specify multiple permitted formats. 这使得更有可能会成功分析操作。This makes the parse operation more likely to succeed. 特定日期和时间的符号和字符串 （例如，在某个特定的语言中星期几的名称） 中使用`s`由定义`provider`参数，因为是精确的格式`s`如果`format`是一种标准格式说明符的字符串。The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `provider`参数可以是任何以下：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示用于解释的区域性`s`。A object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`. 返回的对象及其属性定义的符号和格式设置`s`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`. - 一个定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自定义实现其方法返回对象或提供格式设置信息的对象。A custom implementation whose method returns either the object or the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`，则使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数包含一个或多个成员枚举，用于确定是否以及其中的空白区域未定义由`format`可以出现在`s`和控制分析操作的确切行为。The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation. 下表描述了每隶属枚举会影响的操作方法。The following table describes how each member of the enumeration affects the operation of the method. |DateTimeStyles 成员DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||分析`s`和，如果有必要，将其转换为 UTC。Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 如果`s`包含时区偏移量，或者如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，但`styles`包括标志，该方法分析字符串，调用将返回为 UTC 值并设置属性设置为。If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`指示它表示 UTC，或如果`s`不包含时区信息，但`styles`包括标志，该方法对字符串进行分析、 对返回不执行任何时区转换值，并设置属性设置为。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在所有其他情况下，该标志没有任何影响。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||指定未定义的该空白`format`可以出现在任何单个的日期或时间元素之间。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear between any individual date or time element.| ||指定未定义的空格`format`可以显示在开头`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the beginning of `s`.| ||指定未定义的空格`format`可以在的终端显示`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the end of `s`.| ||指定的`s`可能包含前导、 内部空格和尾随空格未定义的`format`。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces not defined by `format`.| ||指定如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，假定它是表示本地时间。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非标志存在，则所返回的属性值设置为。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定如果`s`缺少的任何时区信息，则假定其值表示 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非标志存在，该方法将返回值与 UTC 与本地时间和集及其属性设置为。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||如果`s`包含时间的返回值的日期设置为不包含日期信息`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.| ||`s`使用默认值分析参数。The `s` parameter is parsed using default values. 中提供的以外的任何空格`format`允许。No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed. 如果`s`缺少所返回的日期的日期部分，值设置为 0001 年 1 月 1 日。If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned value is set to 1/1/0001. 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，所返回的属性对象设置为。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is set to . 如果时区信息中存在`s`，将时间转换为本地时间和所返回的属性对象设置为。If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the property of the returned object is set to .| ||对于包含时区信息的字符串，尝试阻止转换为值替换其属性设置为。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a value with its property set to . 此标记主要阻止 UTC 时间的转换为本地时间。This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 请注意，字符串"2009 年 5 月 01 日上午 8:30"不能成功分析时`styles`参数等于因为不允许前导空格`format`。Note that the string " 5/01/2009 8:30 AM" cannot be parsed successfully when the `styles` parameter equals because leading spaces are not allowed by `format`. 此外，字符串"2009 年 5 月 01 日 09:00"不能与成功分析`format`的"MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm"因为日期字符串前面不带前导零的月份数作为`format`要求。Additionally, the string "5/01/2009 09:00" cannot be parsed successfully with a `format` of "MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm" because the date string does not precede the month number with a leading zero, as `format` requires. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的日期的任何一种分配到的模式匹配的字符串表示形式`formats`参数。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 就像方法中，除方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。It is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`参数包含要分析的日期和时间。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse. 如果`s`参数只包含时间和当前日期使用没有日期，除非`style`参数包括标志，在这种情况下的默认日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`参数包含仅日期没有时间、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`参数还确定是否`s`参数可以包含前导、 内部，或尾随空格字符比允许的格式字符串中的一个其他`formats`。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`. 如果`s`不包含任何时区信息，所返回的属性对象是。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 可以通过更改此行为标志，它将返回值，其属性是，或通过使用并标志，它将返回值，其属性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如果 s 包含时区信息，如有必要，为本地时间转换的时间和所返回的属性对象设置为。If s contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 可以通过更改此行为标志将协调世界时 (UTC) 转换为本地时间和设置无法属性设置为。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `formats`参数包含数组的模式，其中之一`s`必须完全匹配分析操作成功。The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed. 中的模式`formats`参数包含一个或多个自定义格式说明符，从[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表或单个标准格式说明符，用于从标识预定义的模式，[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)表。The patterns in the `formats` parameter consist of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果在自定义格式模式中不使用日期或时间分隔符，使用固定区域性的`provider`参数和最宽的窗体的每个自定义格式说明符。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果你想要在该模式指定小时数，指定较宽的形式"HH"，而不是更窄的窗体"H"。For example, if you want to summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象设置为此计算机上的当前日期和时间，表示为协调通用时间 (UTC)。

span.span: Gets a object that is set to the current date and time on this computer, expressed as the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 其值为当前 UTC 日期和时间的对象。

span.span: An object whose value is the current UTC date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的解决方法取决于系统计时器，具体取决于基础操作系统。The resolution of this property depends on the system timer, which depends on the underlying operating system. 它通常必须介于 0.5 和 15 毫秒。It tends to be between 0.5 and 15 milliseconds. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，返回值是其属性返回。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the return value is a whose property returns . 使用的替代方法是。An alternative to using is . 日期和时间值分配为协调世界时 (UTC)，则表示前者到其属性，后者将分配日期和时间值的 UTC 时间的偏移量 (等于)。While the former indicates that a date and time value is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by assigning to its property, the latter assigns the date and time value the UTC time's offset (equal to ). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法演示如何属性会影响和转换方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取此实例所表示日期的年份部分。

span.span: Gets the year component of the date represented by this instance.

value.span: 年份（介于 1 和 9999 之间）。

span.span: The year, between 1 and 9999.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回公历日历中的当前实例的年份。The property returns the year of the current instance in the Gregorian calendar. 它不返回使用当前区域性的默认日历的年份。It does not return the year using the default calendar of the current culture. 若要检索使用特定日历的年份，可以调用该日历的`GetYear`方法，如以下代码所示。To retrieve the year using a particular calendar, you can call that calendar's `GetYear` method, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.Year#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Year/cs/Year.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Year#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Year/vb/Year.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性。The following example demonstrates the property.
